intro: Senecio ionophyllus, commonly known as the Ionophyllus groundsel, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in rocky, well-drained soils and thrives in full sun. Its yellow flowers are surrounded by pale green bracts, creating a striking visual contrast. Senecio ionophyllus is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and hardy nature.
